projects.name: Sales Mart Prediction
projects.description: Built and deployed a machine learning–based sales prediction web application using Flask and Python. Designed and trained a predictive model achieving 89% accuracy in forecasting individual grocery item sales.

projects.name: Search Engine Recommendation
projects.description: Designed a search engine leveraging NLP and Streamlit for enhanced user query interpretation. Improved search relevance by 79%, offering more accurate product recommendations.

projects.name: LLM Multi-Agent Knowledge Navigator Project
projects.description: Led the development of an AI-driven information retrieval tool powered by LangChain and integrated with APIs. Delivered 85-95% accuracy for academic and general searches, providing reliable knowledge insights through a user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Conversational Q&A Chatbot Implementation with PDF support and chat history
projects.description: The application manages chat history using session states and integrates document retrieval with conversational memory. The code includes error handling, prompt engineering, and demonstrates running the Streamlit app for interactive Q&A with uploaded PDFs.

projects.name: Search Engine With Longchain Tools And Agents
projects.description: This project demonstrates how to build a search-powered conversational AI agent using LangChain and Groq LLMs, wrapped in a clean Streamlit UI. The chatbot doesn’t just generate answers from a single model — instead, it uses LangChain Agents that can reason, choose tools, and act before responding.

projects.name: Animated Solar System
projects.description: A beautiful visual representation of solar system in 2D and 3D with information about each planets and links to wikipedia.

projects.name: Real Time Stock Price Analysis
projects.description: The project's objectives are to build a functional tool that fetches real-time stock data, analyzes it using moving averages, and presents it through interactive visualizations. The tool aims to be user-friendly, educational, and practical, providing insights into stock market trends and aiding in financial analysis.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website built with HTML,CSS and JavaScript, showcasing projects and skills.

projects.name: Data Professional Model
projects.description: Designed and implemented a dashboard using Power BI and Python to streamline data handling and analysis for data professionals, resulting in a 91 percent increase in work efficiency.
